text: It's been a while since I've written about writing into AI chatbots -- ie I am writing something designed to be queried via something like ChatGPT, or ideally, ChatGPT itself. I figure by now something probably exists that can ingest RSS or (ideally) OPML -- and have it be processed and kept updated as things change? I have a big documentation project coming up, and I'd like to, if possible, start off with the new medium very much in mind. I think we can make docs that work much better, obviously.
